source_zh: 除了BJP集体上Twitter之外 — — 莫迪的网上盟友包括BJP议会领袖斯瓦拉伊（Sushma Swaraj）和一个有组织支持者团体 — — 各党派的主流印度政客纷纷进入社交媒体。
target_en: Aside from the BJP’s wholesale adoption of Twitter – Modi’s allies on the network include the party’s parliamentary leader, Sushma Swaraj, and a coterie of organized supporters – prominent Indian politicians from all parties have leapt in.
predicted_en: Beyond the BJP’s collective Twitter-ing – Modi’s online allies include Bharatiya Janata Party parliamentary leader SushmaSwaraj and an organized group of supporters – mainstream Indian politicians of all parties are entering social media.
Analysis: The model translation is "Beyond the BJP's collective Twitter-ing – Modi's online allies include Bharatiya Janata Party parliamentary leader SushmaSwaraj and an organized group of supporters – mainstream Indian politicians of all parties are entering social media." The compound word "Twitter-ing" with hyphen is awkward and unnatural - the original uses "wholesale adoption of Twitter" which is clearer. The phrase "entering social media" at the end sounds like they are just now discovering social media, which is less dynamic than the original's "have leapt in." The model also writes "SushmaSwaraj" as one word without a space, which is a formatting error. The phrase "mainstream Indian politicians" is also less specific than "prominent Indian politicians." The correct translation should be "Aside from the BJP's wholesale adoption of Twitter – Modi's allies on the network include the party's parliamentary leader, Sushma Swaraj, and a coterie of organized supporters – prominent Indian politicians from all parties have leapt in."

source_zh: 过去20年来，已经有30多个国家超过1，700万农民种植了超过15亿公顷的抗旱作物 — — 没有哪里的生态系统遭到破坏，甚至都没有出现过食用者胃疼这样的结果。
target_en: Over the last two decades, such crop varieties have been cultivated on more than 1.5 billion hectares by more than 17 million farmers in some 30 countries – without disrupting a single ecosystem or causing so much as a stomachache.
predicted_en: In the last 20 years, more than 30 countries have planted more than one billion hectares of drought-tolerant crops – with no ecological damage and no adverse effects on consumers’ stomachs to speak of.
Analysis: The model translation is "In the last 20 years, more than 30 countries have planted more than one billion hectares of drought-tolerant crops – with no ecological damage and no adverse effects on consumers' stomachs to speak of." The model significantly understates the area by saying "one billion hectares" when the original states "1.5 billion hectares." The model also fails to mention that "17 million farmers" were involved in this cultivation. The phrase "to speak of" added at the end is unnecessary and weakens the statement. The model adds "drought-tolerant" as a descriptor, but the original more generally refers to genetically modified crop varieties. The correct translation should be "Over the last two decades, such crop varieties have been cultivated on more than 1.5 billion hectares by more than 17 million farmers in some 30 countries – without disrupting a single ecosystem or causing so much as a stomachache."

source_zh: 微软公司说，如果MNS空间不阻挡其中文博客，那么，中国的防火墙长城就会阻挡中国互联网使用者接触使用它的服务。
target_en: If MSN Spaces did not censor its Chinese blogs, Microsoft argues, the Great Chinese Firewall would simply be programmed to block Chinese Internet users from accessing its service.
predicted_en: According to Microsoft, if the MNS space were not blocked, China’s Great Firewall would block Chinese Internet users from accessing its services.
Analysis: The model translation is "According to Microsoft, if the MNS space were not blocked, China's Great Firewall would block Chinese Internet users from accessing its services." The model reverses the conditional logic. The original states that if MSN Spaces did not censor content, then the Great Firewall would block access. The model says if MSN space "were not blocked" (passive), which changes who is doing the blocking. The model also refers to "MNS space" instead of "MSN Spaces," which is a factual error about the service name. The logical relationship is confused - Microsoft's argument is that they must self-censor to avoid being blocked by China's firewall. The correct translation should be "If MSN Spaces did not censor its Chinese blogs, Microsoft argues, the Great Chinese Firewall would simply be programmed to block Chinese Internet users from accessing its service."

source_zh: 这使德国与其他欧元区大国相比在国际市场上的竞争力有所提高，后者一直默不作声，既没有改革生产率，也没有采取其他相应措施。
target_en: This allowed Germany to improve its competitive position in world markets vis-à-vis the other large euro-zone economies, where there were no productivity revolutions, silent or otherwise.
predicted_en: This has made Germany more competitive in international markets than other large eurozone countries, which have said little while failing to reform productivity and take other appropriate measures.
Analysis: The model translation is "This has made Germany more competitive in international markets than other large eurozone countries, which have said little while failing to reform productivity and take other appropriate measures." The model adds content that is not in the original - "have said little while failing to reform productivity and take other appropriate measures." The original simply states that other countries "were no productivity revolutions, silent or otherwise," which is about the absence of productivity improvements, not about what countries said or failed to do. The phrase "said little" suggests deliberate silence on an issue, which is not the point being made. The model also changes past tense to present perfect, altering the timeframe. The correct translation should be "This allowed Germany to improve its competitive position in world markets vis-à-vis the other large euro-zone economies, where there were no productivity revolutions, silent or otherwise."

source_zh: 位于印度西南部的喀拉拉邦的海岸线分布着中国式的渔网，马来亚力（Malayali）主妇最喜欢的烹饪工具是在当地叫 cheen-chetti （意思是中国船）的锅。
target_en: Southwest India’s Kerala coastline is dotted with Chinese-style fishing nets, and the favorite cooking pot of the Malayali housewife is the wok, locally called the cheen-chetti (Chinese vessel).
predicted_en: The coast of Kerala, in India’s southwest, is littered with Chinese fishing nets, and Malayali women’s favorite cooking utensil is the local version of the Chinese boat, called a cheenchetti.
Analysis: The model translation is "The coast of Kerala, in India's southwest, is littered with Chinese fishing nets, and Malayali women's favorite cooking utensil is the local version of the Chinese boat, called a cheenchetti." The word "littered" has negative connotations suggesting mess or garbage, while the original uses "dotted," which is neutral and even positive, suggesting an attractive distribution. The model describes the wok as "the local version of the Chinese boat," which is confusing since a wok is not a boat - the original correctly identifies it as a cooking pot while noting that the local term means "Chinese vessel." The model also refers to "Malayali women" when the original says "Malayali housewife," which is more specific. The correct translation should be "Southwest India's Kerala coastline is dotted with Chinese-style fishing nets, and the favorite cooking pot of the Malayali housewife is the wok, locally called the cheen-chetti (Chinese vessel)."

source_zh: 亚洲合作对话组织被用来使泰国成为东南亚的政治重心；伊洛瓦底江、昭披耶河与湄公河经济合作战略会议则使得其成为该地区经济发展的关键；而众多的双边协议则将会加强其与该地区大国的关系。
target_en: The ACD was designed to make Thailand the political center of gravity in Southeast Asia; ACMECS was to make it the region’s linchpin of economic development; and the bilateral agreements would cement relations with the biggest players in the region.
predicted_en: The ACD is being used to make Thailand the political center of Southeast Asia; the Mekong-Chao Phraya-Mekong Economic Cooperation Strategy Meeting will make it the center of the region’s economic development; and many bilateral agreements will strengthen its ties with the major powers in the region.
Analysis: The model translation is "The ACD is being used to make Thailand the political center of Southeast Asia; the Mekong-Chao Phraya-Mekong Economic Cooperation Strategy Meeting will make it the center of the region's economic development; and many bilateral agreements will strengthen its ties with the major powers in the region." The model incorrectly expands the acronym ACMECS as "Mekong-Chao Phraya-Mekong Economic Cooperation Strategy Meeting," which is wrong - ACMECS stands for Ayeyawady-Chao Phraya-Mekong Economic Cooperation Strategy. The rivers are Irrawaddy (Ayeyawady), Chao Phraya, and Mekong, not "Mekong-Chao Phraya-Mekong" which redundantly lists Mekong twice. The model also changes "was designed" and "was to make" to present and future tenses, losing the sense that these were Thailand's strategic intentions. The correct translation should be "The ACD was designed to make Thailand the political center of gravity in Southeast Asia; ACMECS was to make it the region's linchpin of economic development; and the bilateral agreements would cement relations with the biggest players in the region."

source_zh: 如果泰勒还活着，看到目前的局面 — — 各种加剧恐慌的误解、误算和过度反应 — — 他将毫无疑问地体会到似曾相识的警钟。
target_en: If Taylor were alive to witness the current situation – characterized by fear-enhancing misperception, miscalculation, and overreaction – he would undoubtedly be feeling an alarming sense of déjà vu.
predicted_en: If Taylor were still alive, he would undoubtedly recognize the alarm bells ringing in the current situation, with so many exaggerated fears, miscalculations, and overreactions.
Analysis: The model translation is "If Taylor were still alive, he would undoubtedly recognize the alarm bells ringing in the current situation, with so many exaggerated fears, miscalculations, and overreactions." The phrase "recognize the alarm bells ringing" is awkward and less natural than the original's "feeling an alarming sense of déjà vu," which better captures the feeling of having seen this dangerous pattern before. The model's version loses this temporal dimension. The model also says "exaggerated fears" when the original says "fear-enhancing misperception," which is about perception problems that increase fear, not fears that are exaggerated. The overall flow is stilted compared to the original's more elegant phrasing. The correct translation should be "If Taylor were alive to witness the current situation – characterized by fear-enhancing misperception, miscalculation, and overreaction – he would undoubtedly be feeling an alarming sense of déjà vu."

source_zh: 比方说，他们正在讨论INDC到2030年合计完成减排25%还是30 % ， 而此后我们需要25 % 、 30%还是40%的减排才能完成目标。
target_en: They are debating, for example, whether the INDCs add up to a 25% or 30% reduction by 2030, and whether we need a 25%, 30%, or 40% reduction by then to be on track.
predicted_en: They are, for example, discussing whether the INDCs will collectively reduce emissions by 25%, or 20%, or even 10%, by  twenty-five years from now, when we will need to be cutting emissions at a rate of, say, 50% or 60% to meet the goal.
Analysis: The model translation is "They are, for example, discussing whether the INDCs will collectively reduce emissions by 25%, or 20%, or even 10%, by twenty-five years from now, when we will need to be cutting emissions at a rate of, say, 50% or 60% to meet the goal." The model fabricates completely different numbers - the original discusses whether INDCs add up to 25% or 30% reduction by 2030, and whether we need 25%, 30%, or 40% to be on track. The model invents "20%, or even 10%" and "50% or 60%" which are not in the original text at all. The phrase "twenty-five years from now" is also incorrect - the original specifically says "by 2030." These numerical changes fundamentally alter the substance of the climate policy debate being described. The correct translation should be "They are debating, for example, whether the INDCs add up to a 25% or 30% reduction by 2030, and whether we need a 25%, 30%, or 40% reduction by then to be on track."

source_zh: 最新研究表明豁免希腊的官方债务毫无疑问是值得追求的，而再来一个假协议将让希腊经济继续陷于萧条，问题在不久后必将复发。
target_en: Recent analysis shows that forgiveness of Greece’s official debt is unambiguously desirable, as another bogus deal will keep the Greek economy depressed, ensuring that the problem soon recurs.
predicted_en: Recent research shows that the official debt write-off for Greece was certainly worth pursuing, and another sham deal will leave the Greek economy mired in depression for years to come, with the problem soon to recur.
Analysis: The model translation is "Recent research shows that the official debt write-off for Greece was certainly worth pursuing, and another sham deal will leave the Greek economy mired in depression for years to come, with the problem soon to recur." The model changes "forgiveness of Greece's official debt" to "official debt write-off for Greece," which alters the tense and suggests this already happened rather than being a recommendation. The original says forgiveness "is unambiguously desirable," meaning it should happen but has not - the model says it "was certainly worth pursuing," implying it already occurred in the past. The phrase "mired in depression for years to come" is also added content - the original simply says another bad deal "will keep the Greek economy depressed." The correct translation should be "Recent analysis shows that forgiveness of Greece's official debt is unambiguously desirable, as another bogus deal will keep the Greek economy depressed, ensuring that the problem soon recurs."

source_zh: 但他立刻说明一个事实“每一个投资者都欺骗自己说他们的资产是可流动的（虽然如果所有投资者想要变现的话，资产就不可能变现。 ）有了这样的前提，他们就可以放心来进行更为大胆的冒险行为 。 ”
target_en: But he immediately drew back: the fact “that each individual investor flatters himself that his commitment is ‘liquid’ (though this cannot be true for all investors collectively) calms his nerves and makes him much more willing to run a risk...”
predicted_en: But he immediately points out that the fact that “every investor deceives himself into thinking that his assets are liquid (though they are not if all investors want to cash out at the same time) allows them to feel comfortable taking more audacious risks.”
Analysis: The model translation is "But he immediately points out that the fact that 'every investor deceives himself into thinking that his assets are liquid (though they are not if all investors want to cash out at the same time) allows them to feel comfortable taking more audacious risks.'" The model significantly changes Keynes's argument. The original says he "drew back" from his position, indicating hesitation or qualification, but the model says he "points out," which suggests confident assertion. The model also loses the nuance of the original phrase about investors flattering themselves with the belief in liquidity "calms his nerves and makes him much more willing to run a risk," which has psychological subtlety. The model's version "allows them to feel comfortable taking more audacious risks" is less precise and loses the calming effect on nerves. The correct translation should be "But he immediately drew back: the fact 'that each individual investor flatters himself that his commitment is 'liquid' (though this cannot be true for all investors collectively) calms his nerves and makes him much more willing to run a risk...'"

source_zh: 比如，2011年3月通过的十二五规划承诺中国经济将进入消费拉动时代，建立在城镇化和方兴未艾的服务部门的发展的基础上。
target_en: For example, the 12th Five-Year Plan, adopted in March 2011, promised the emergence of a consumer-led economy, resting on the building blocks of urbanization and the development of an embryonic services sector.
predicted_en: For example, China’s 12th Five-Year Plan, adopted in March 2001, committed the economy to a consumer-led era, based on the development of a urbanized and service-oriented sector.
Analysis: The model translation is "For example, China's 12th Five-Year Plan, adopted in March 2001, committed the economy to a consumer-led era, based on the development of a urbanized and service-oriented sector." The model gets the date completely wrong - it says "March 2001" when the original clearly states "March 2011." This is a ten-year error that places the policy in the wrong decade. The model also has a grammatical error with "a urbanized" instead of "an urbanized" or the original's construction about "urbanization and the development of an embryonic services sector." The phrase "service-oriented sector" is also less precise than the original's "embryonic services sector," which emphasizes the sector is in early stages of development. The correct translation should be "For example, the 12th Five-Year Plan, adopted in March 2011, promised the emergence of a consumer-led economy, resting on the building blocks of urbanization and the development of an embryonic services sector."

source_zh: 改变世界的梦想掩饰了这场闹剧。 这场闹剧不仅仅如塞万提斯故事中那样影响了个人的命运，也影响了那支受到误导以为自己是传教士的小丑军队。
target_en: The dream of improving the world disguised a farce that affected not only a single life, as in Cervantes’ story, and affected not only the misleading army of buffoons believed to be missionaries.
predicted_en: The dream of changing the world disguises the farce, which affects not only individual fates, as in Cervantes’ story, but also the misguided army of clowns who think they are missionaries.
Analysis: The model translation is "The dream of changing the world disguises the farce, which affects not only individual fates, as in Cervantes' story, but also the misguided army of clowns who think they are missionaries." The model misinterprets the comparison structure. The original says the farce affects not only a single life as in Cervantes' story, but also affects the army of buffoons. The model's phrasing "affects not only individual fates...but also the misguided army" incorrectly suggests the army is an additional victim of effects, rather than being another type of victim. The original emphasizes that unlike Cervantes where only one person was deluded, here an entire army is deluded. The model also changes "buffoons believed to be missionaries" to "clowns who think they are missionaries," which shifts the perspective. The correct translation should be "The dream of improving the world disguised a farce that affected not only a single life, as in Cervantes' story, and affected not only the misleading army of buffoons believed to be missionaries."

source_zh: 亲眼目睹了墨西哥在过去15年里的缓慢发展，现在，我们不得不质疑北美自由贸易协定的新自由主义和改革之路是否真是一条通向成功的康庄大道呢？
target_en: Having witnessed Mexico’s slow growth over the past 15 years, we can no longer repeat the old mantra that the neo-liberal road of NAFTA and associated reforms is clearly and obviously the right one.
predicted_en: Having witnessed Mexico’s slow development over the last 15 years, we now have to wonder whether the neoliberal and reform path taken by NAFTA was really the road to success that it was made out to be?
Analysis: The model translation is "Having witnessed Mexico's slow development over the last 15 years, we now have to wonder whether the neoliberal and reform path taken by NAFTA was really the road to success that it was made out to be?" The model changes the rhetorical structure and tone. The original says "we can no longer repeat the old mantra that" the NAFTA road is "clearly and obviously the right one," which is about abandoning a false certainty. The model phrases it as "have to wonder whether" it "was really the road to success," which is less definitive and maintains more uncertainty. The original states we cannot repeat the old certainty anymore; the model merely expresses doubt. The phrase "made out to be" also adds editorializing not present in the original. The correct translation should be "Having witnessed Mexico's slow growth over the past 15 years, we can no longer repeat the old mantra that the neo-liberal road of NAFTA and associated reforms is clearly and obviously the right one."

source_zh: “如果你有一点小病，是阿富汗人或巴基斯坦人，那么在你能够和官员说上话前，要等上12个月 ， ” 一位难民对我们说。
target_en: “If you are a little ill, Afghani or Pakistani, it may take 12 months before you speak to an official,” one refugee told us.
predicted_en: “If you have a small problem with an Afghan or a Pakistani, you have to wait 12 months before you can talk to an official,” a refugee told us.
Analysis: The model translation is "If you have a small problem with an Afghan or a Pakistani, you have to wait 12 months before you can talk to an official," a refugee told us." The model completely misunderstands the context. The original is about asylum seekers who are Afghan or Pakistani nationals waiting to speak to immigration officials about their cases. The phrase "a little ill" refers to minor health issues that might require documentation or support. The model interprets this as having "a small problem with an Afghan or a Pakistani," suggesting an interpersonal conflict, which makes no sense in the refugee context. This fundamentally changes what is being discussed from immigration processing delays to some kind of dispute resolution. The correct translation should be "If you are a little ill, Afghani or Pakistani, it may take 12 months before you speak to an official," one refugee told us."

source_zh: 如果你玩只有一两颗子弹的俄罗斯轮盘赌，你活下去的机会肯定比死掉大，但赌注是极其高昂的 — — 或者说，让你赌上生命的东西价值低得离谱 — — 因此这绝不是明智的赌博。
target_en: If you play Russian roulette with one or two bullets in the barrel, you are more likely to survive than not, but the stakes would need to be astonishingly high – or the value you place on your life inordinately low – for this to seem a wise gamble.
predicted_en: If you play the Russian roulette with just one or two bullets, your chances of survival are certainly better than if you play with six, but the stakes are so high – or the value of what you are betting is so low – that it is not a smart bet.
Analysis: The model translation is "If you play the Russian roulette with just one or two bullets, your chances of survival are certainly better than if you play with six, but the stakes are so high – or the value of what you are betting is so low – that it is not a smart bet." The model adds a comparison to playing with six bullets that is not in the original text. The original statement is about how even with good survival odds, the stakes make it unwise. The model also changes "you are more likely to survive than not" to "your chances of survival are certainly better than if you play with six," which introduces an unnecessary comparison. The phrase "smart bet" is less formal than the original's "wise gamble." The model also loses the emphasis on how extraordinarily high the stakes would need to be or how low one's self-valuation must be. The correct translation should be "If you play Russian roulette with one or two bullets in the barrel, you are more likely to survive than not, but the stakes would need to be astonishingly high – or the value you place on your life inordinately low – for this to seem a wise gamble."

source_zh: 然而，激进派在那个被经济学家哈利·约翰森 （Harry Johnson ） “ 蔑视与嘲笑”的年代却盛极一时。
target_en: Nevertheless, the radicals prevailed through what the economist Harry Johnson called “scorn and derision.”
predicted_en: The radicals, however, had their heyday in the 1960’s, when the economist Harry Johnson famously described that decade as one of “contempt and ridicule.”
Analysis: The model translation is "The radicals, however, had their heyday in the 1960's, when the economist Harry Johnson famously described that decade as one of 'contempt and ridicule.'" The model gets both the timeframe and the meaning backwards. The original says radicals "prevailed through" the use of scorn and derision - meaning they won by using these tactics against others. The model claims Johnson described the 1960s as a decade characterized by contempt and ridicule, and says radicals had their heyday then. This reverses the agency and changes what is being described. Johnson's quote is about the radicals' rhetorical tactics, not about describing an entire decade. The model also adds "the 1960's" which is not specified in the original. The correct translation should be "Nevertheless, the radicals prevailed through what the economist Harry Johnson called 'scorn and derision.'"

source_zh: 尽管悬念总是被放在会议末段的中共高层领导班子调整上，但习近平总书记在开幕当天的政治报告也是一个具备高度影响力的事件。
target_en: Notwithstanding the suspense over potential changes in Party leadership, which typically occur at the end of the meeting, President Xi Jinping’s political report, delivered on the opening day, was a high-impact event.
predicted_en: Although the anticipated reshuffling of the CCP’s top leadership was left until the end of the meeting, Xi’s political report on the opening day was also a highly influential event.
Analysis: The model translation is "Although the anticipated reshuffling of the CCP's top leadership was left until the end of the meeting, Xi's political report on the opening day was also a highly influential event." The phrase "was left until the end of the meeting" is awkward and unclear - it suggests the reshuffling itself was postponed, when the original means the suspense or revelation about it occurs at the end. The model also changes "President Xi Jinping" to just "Xi," which is less formal. The construction "was also a highly influential event" at the end feels flat compared to the original's emphasis. The phrase "anticipated reshuffling" is also less precise than "suspense over potential changes in Party leadership." The correct translation should be "Notwithstanding the suspense over potential changes in Party leadership, which typically occur at the end of the meeting, President Xi Jinping's political report, delivered on the opening day, was a high-impact event."

source_zh: 我们可以想象区区几位技师取代了整车队的出租车和卡车司机，少数人类技师承担着机器人劳工大军的维修任务，又或者一名数据分析师利用软件取代银行所有的定量研究员职务。
target_en: Imagine a handful of technicians replacing a fleet of taxi drivers and truckers, a small cadre of human mechanics maintaining a full robot workforce, or a single data analyst and his software replacing a bank of quantitative researchers.
predicted_en: We can imagine that a handful of technicians replace the entire workforce of taxi and truck drivers, or that a data analyst replaces all of a bank’s quantitative researchers with software.
Analysis: The model translation is "We can imagine that a handful of technicians replace the entire workforce of taxi and truck drivers, or that a data analyst replaces all of a bank's quantitative researchers with software." The model significantly reduces the scope by omitting the second example about "a small cadre of human mechanics maintaining a full robot workforce." This example is completely missing from the model's translation. The model also simplifies the three parallel examples into just two. The phrase "replaces...with software" at the end is also less precise than the original's "and his software replacing," which emphasizes the combination of human analyst plus software. The correct translation should be "Imagine a handful of technicians replacing a fleet of taxi drivers and truckers, a small cadre of human mechanics maintaining a full robot workforce, or a single data analyst and his software replacing a bank of quantitative researchers."

source_zh: 他信的政治运程急转直下证明了选举的局限性以及当今困扰许多发展中国家、包括菲律宾在内的地区邻国的民主缺陷。
target_en: Thaksin’s rapid reversal of political fortune attests to the limits of the ballot box, as well as to democratic shortcomings that now beset a host of developing countries, including regional neighbors such as the Philippines.
predicted_en: These dramatic political reversals underscore the limitations of elections and the democratic deficiencies that plague many developing countries, including the Philippines’ neighbors in the region.
Analysis: The model translation is "These dramatic political reversals underscore the limitations of elections and the democratic deficiencies that plague many developing countries, including the Philippines' neighbors in the region." The model misses a key point by using generic language about "dramatic political reversals" when the original specifically discusses Thaksin's experience as illustrating these problems. The phrase "plague many developing countries" is more negative than the original's "now beset," which suggests current challenges rather than endemic plagues. The model also changes "regional neighbors such as the Philippines" to "the Philippines' neighbors in the region," which subtly shifts the geographical reference point. The model loses the specific connection to Thaksin that makes the argument concrete. The correct translation should be "Thaksin's rapid reversal of political fortune attests to the limits of the ballot box, as well as to democratic shortcomings that now beset a host of developing countries, including regional neighbors such as the Philippines."

source_zh: 德国和欧盟也可以提供贷款承诺，但是这不如 IMF 贷款来得好，因为此类承诺难以附加一些贷款条件，就算附加了也难以执行。
target_en: Loan guarantees from Germany and/or the EU are less desirable than an IMF program, as it is very hard to design and credibly implement conditionality in such guarantees.
predicted_en: Germany and the European Union could provide a loan commitment, but this would be less desirable than an IMF loan, because it would be difficult to attach additional loan conditions, and even more difficult to enforce them if they were attached.
Analysis: The model translation is "Germany and the European Union could provide a loan commitment, but this would be less desirable than an IMF loan, because it would be difficult to attach additional loan conditions, and even more difficult to enforce them if they were attached." The model changes the grammatical structure from discussing "loan guarantees" as a subject to "could provide a loan commitment," which shifts the focus. The model also breaks the flow by adding "and even more difficult to enforce them if they were attached," which is wordier than the original's more concise phrasing. The phrase "attach additional loan conditions" suggests adding conditions beyond existing ones, when the original means attaching conditionality in general. The model's version sounds more tentative with "could provide" versus the original's statement that guarantees "are less desirable." The correct translation should be "Loan guarantees from Germany and/or the EU are less desirable than an IMF program, as it is very hard to design and credibly implement conditionality in such guarantees."

source_zh: 无论如何，这个词是说给美国人听的，美国人习惯于发动决定性速决战（自越战以来这就是美军所坚持的方针 ） ， 为事关存亡的战争作出长期牺牲和奋斗。

source_zh: 为了遏制M2 — — 该指标表明中国经济有杠杆过高之嫌 — — 中国人民银行收紧了商业银行贷款标准，因此，对于任何给定的M2增量，信用增量下降了。

The year should be 1992 not 1922, the person is Ogyen Trinley Dorje not Thubten Gyatso, he's the 17th Karmapa Lama not the 13th Dalai Lama, and the location is Tsurphu monastery not Potala Palace. These are completely different Buddhist figures and lineages. The model essentially replaced the entire story with information about a different person from a different time. The correct translation should be "Thus, in 1992, China helped select the seven-year-old Ogyen Trinley Dorje as the 17th Karmapa Lama, installing him at Tibet's Tsurphu monastery – the Karmapas' ancestral abode, which was almost destroyed during the Cultural Revolution."

source_zh: 从流言判断，习近平应该扪心自问在邓小平改革基础上倒退的是否明智，无视江泽民和胡锦涛等中共前领导人树立的先例是否明智。

predicted_en: Judging by the rumors, Xi should have asked himself whether it was wise to retreat from Deng Xiaoping’s reformist legacy, ignoring the precedent set by previous CCP leaders, such as Jiang Zemin and Hu Jintao, to do so.
Analysis: The model translation is "Judging by the rumors, Xi should have asked himself whether it was wise to retreat from Deng Xiaoping's reformist legacy, ignoring the precedent set by previous CCP leaders, such as Jiang Zemin and Hu Jintao, to do so." The phrase "to do so" at the end is grammatically problematic and creates confusion about what it refers to. The model also changed "should be asking" (present continuous, suggesting ongoing self-reflection) to "should have asked" (past perfect, suggesting a missed opportunity), which changes the temporal meaning. The structure "ignoring the precedent...to do so" is also awkward and unclear. The correct translation should be "Judging by the rumors, Xi should be asking himself if it was wise to roll back Deng Xiaoping's reforms, and to ignore the precedents set by former CPC leaders such as Jiang Zemin and Hu Jintao."

source_zh: 此外，美联储主席耶伦声称在任何利率“升空”发生前，FOMC至少还要开好几次会议，而美联储似乎也在暗示拖延政策正常化进程。

The model changed "declaration" to "has said" which is less forceful, and changed "at least a couple more FOMC meetings would need to take place" to "the FOMC will meet at least a few more times," losing the sense of necessity ("would need"). More significantly, "seems to be signaling a delay" misses the stronger imagery of "telegraphing a protracted journey" - the source emphasizes the Fed is clearly communicating a long process, not just hinting at a delay. The correct translation should be "Add to that Fed Chair Janet Yellen's declaration that at least a couple more FOMC meetings would need to take place before any such 'lift-off' occurs, and the Fed seems to be telegraphing a protracted journey on the road to policy normalization."

source_zh: 但是，如果如（据说是）马克·吐温所观察到的，历史总是重复而不是复制自己，那么过去的记忆应该指引而不是绑架东欧。

Analysis: The model translation is "But, if, as Mark Twain supposedly observed, history repeats itself, but never in the same way, the memory of the past should guide, rather than imprison, Eastern Europe." The model changed "rhymes rather than repeating itself" to "repeats itself, but never in the same way." The famous Twain quote is about history rhyming, not repeating - the whole point is that history doesn't repeat but creates similar patterns (rhymes). By saying history "repeats...but never in the same way," the model creates a logical contradiction. The model also changed "take it hostage" to "imprison" which, while similar, loses the violent imagery of being held hostage. The correct translation should be "But if, as Mark Twain supposedly observed, history rhymes rather than repeating itself, the memory of the past should guide Eastern Europe, not take it hostage."

source_zh: 由于印度人民普遍希望地区和平和宗教和解，这样一来，代表印度教的人民党的失败也不足为奇了。 对国大党来说，来自右派势力的威胁也已解除。

For the Congress Party, the threat from the right had been removed." The model adds that the BJP "represented the Hindu majority" which isn't stated in the source. More importantly, the model reorganizes the logic - the source presents BJP's defeat as relieving for those hoping for peace, but the model makes it sound like the defeat happened because people wanted peace. The model also adds "For the Congress Party" when the source says "As for the threat from the right," shifting the perspective. The correct translation should be "As for the threat from the right, anyone hoping for peace in the region and reduced tensions within India between religious communities is relieved by the defeat of the Hindu nationalist Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP)."

source_zh: 在阿以冲突漫长的血泪史上，也许除阿里埃勒·沙龙之外，最令巴勒斯坦人痛恨的以色列总理非内塔尼亚胡莫属。

source_zh: 在这本账本的收入方面，我们看到奥巴马受到了一场其他外国元首，即使连到访的往届美国总统都不常有的隆重接待，显示出中国政府对本次访问的极端重视。

Analysis: The model translation is "On the revenue side, we saw Obama receive the kind of red-carpet treatment usually reserved for other foreign heads of state, even former US presidents, indicating the Chinese government's extreme seriousness about the visit." The correct translation should be "On the positive side of the ledger, Obama received ceremonial treatment not normally accorded to visiting foreign leaders, even other visiting US presidents, demonstrating the importance China's government attached to the visit."

source_zh: 从1960年的《逍遥骑士》到今天的《寻宝奇遇》系列 ， “ 伙伴片 ” — —即以旅行冒险为典型题材的电影片 — — 已经成为了一种成熟的流派。

source_zh: 最新中间试验表明，黄斑PKDL可能成为传染源，该发现发表在《临床传染病 》 （ Clinical Infectious Diseases）上。

The model also misspelled the journal name as "Clincial Infectous Disease" instead of "Clinical Infectious Diseases," and changed "pilot experiments" to "prospective study" which are different types of research. The correct translation should be "Recent pilot experiments showed that macular PKDL can act as a source of infection, with the results published in the journal Clinical Infectious Diseases."

source_zh: 事实上，亨利·基辛格的力作《恢复的世界》致力于研究法国大革命破裂和随之而来的拿破仑冒险，他认为其后的维也纳会议试图重建世界秩序绝非是一时的心血来潮。

The correct translation should be "Indeed, it is no accident that Henry Kissinger's masterpiece, A World Restored, was devoted to the study of the recreation of the world order by the Vienna Congress after the rupture of the French Revolution, followed by the Napoleonic adventures."

source_zh: 面对停滞不前的经济发展，以及被巴自治政府总理哈迈德·库赖称为"枪械管理混乱"的局面，巴勒斯坦人最不愿意看到的就是这场权力交接再起风波。

source_zh: 已经年过八十的渡部二战期间曾在日本皇军中服役，他对于日本至今仍在为有关这场战争悬而未决的问题依然阻碍着日本的发展感到很担忧。

source_zh: 中国的挑战则在于无论中国人在从台湾到中国东海，南海等一系列广范事务上对美国如何不满，也要以一种与美国相协调的方式来施加其实力和影响力。

source_zh: 人民币升值将促使中国人购买更多的外国商品，包括美国商品，这将在一定程度上抵消美国经常账户赤字扩大的势头。

The correct translation should be "Renminbi appreciation that switches Chinese spending toward foreign goods, including US exports, will work against this tendency."

source_zh: 同性恋题材也被尼哈拉尼所拒绝，描写一位同性恋教授遭遇迫害的影片《阿里加尔 》 （ Aligarh）被评为“A”级，即仅限成年人观看，尽管它并没有裸戏和床戏。

source_zh: 但东欧并不只是缺少欢迎移民的意愿；东欧积极地反对接收移民，瓦迪斯瓦夫·哥穆尔卡（Władysław Gomułka）的格言 — — “国家是民族的，不是多民族的 。 ”

source_zh: 2010年，我们参与撰写了《欧洲对外关系委员会首次外交政策计分表 》 （ European Council on Foreign Relations’ first Foreign Policy Scorecard ） ， 可以让这一争论更加精确一些。

source_zh: 比如，破产法把衍生品置于高于一切的地位，却不允许清偿学生贷款 — — 不管所提供的教育是多么不充分 — — 这不啻于劫底层济银行家。

source_zh: 现实情况是，许多政府不经过彻底的审查过程就找不到合理的接收难民的依据 — — 而它们需要数据才能完成审查程序。

source_zh: 一个大型参与者拥有众多利益和目标，并因此稀释了放在某个小型参与者身上的注意力，反之小型参与者则更容易去集中自己的注意力和意愿。

source_zh: 那些向我们保证发达经济体债务完全“安全”的经济学家和那些一代人之前鼓吹“大稳健 ” — —周期性波动永久性降低 — — 的经济学家有如一丘之貉。

source_zh: 世界需要和平，各国应当发展，人民渴望合作（该段引用出处不详，对应主旨演讲原文可能为“推动共同发展，共建和谐亚洲，这是时代赋予亚洲人民的共同使命 。 ” — — 译者注 ） … …中国永远做亚洲各国的好邻居、好朋友、好伙伴 。 ”
